text: Summer M. Walker (born April 11, 1996) is an American singer-songwriter. She is signed to Interscope Records and Love Renaissance, the latter is a record label. Her commercial mixtape, Last Day of Summer, was released on October 19, 2018. Her first studio album, Over It, was released on October 4, 2019. It got high marks from musical critics. At the Soul Train Music Awards in 2019, Walker was the recipient for the Best New Artist. Walker was discovered by a woman under exactly the same name as her (the singer). The other Summer Walker works at the Love Renaissance music studio.
